author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lumina Gold Announces Non-Binding Letter Of Intent For $57 Mln Earn-In And Joint Venture Agreement
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - Lumina Gold Corp:
* LUMINA GOLD ANNOUNCES NON-BINDING LETTER OF INTENT FOR US$57 MILLION EARN-IN AND JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT
* LUMINA GOLD - ENTERS NON-BINDING LETTER OF INTENT FOR AN EARN-IN AND JV AGREEMENT WITH A WHOLLY OWNED UNIT OF ANGLO AMERICAN PLC
* LUMINA GOLD - UNDER LOI, ANGLO AMERICAN, THROUGH A JV CO, WOULD HAVE RIGHT TO EARN 60% OWNERSHIP INTEREST IN COâ€™S ECUADOR PROPERTIES IF IT INVESTS $50 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
